title: Strengthening Pedagogical Competencies: Gamification-Based Online Discussion Skill Development Course

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners participate in weekly discussions with at least 80% engagement rate on a gamification platform
Learners achieve cognitive engagement at Bloom’s taxonomy top two levels (analysis/evaluation) through discussion posts

Learners record self-directed learning plans and executions at least three times per week using a badge and point system within the LMS, and submit proof of learning habit formation by achieving over 150 cumulative points at the end of the six-month course.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
